H0.text: Who knocked Andy Murray out of the 2013 US Open in the quarter-finals? (Surname only will do). Federer

H1.text: Who knocked Andy Murray out of the 2013 US Open in the quarter-finals? (Surname only will do). Djokovic

H2.text: Who knocked Andy Murray out of the 2013 US Open in the quarter-finals? (Surname only will do). Nadal

H3.text: Who knocked Andy Murray out of the 2013 US Open in the quarter-finals? (Surname only will do). Wawrinka

A4.text: Andy Murray was the defending champion, but lost in the quarterfinals to Stanislas Wawrinka.
